OFW ate my first response, so I'm not going to re-type it all. Yes, I've been talking to him about all the issues for a while (especially friends). I've tried
to share with you. But sure, lets chat.
I am concerned that introducing a new school when he has no idea even what his own parents are doing, might be a tricky time. The poor dude has no
safe harbor in the storm anymore.
Please don't take any of this as a knock on you. I'm just very concerned for him these days.
